vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.5.32;
son of: Noah (H5146);
brother of: Shem (H8035) and Ham (H2526);
father of: Gomer (H1586), Magog (H4031), Madai (H4074), Javan (H3120), Tubal (H8422), Meshech (H4902) and Tiras (H8494)
§ Japheth = "opened"
the 3rd son of Noah whose descendants after the flood settled on the coastal lands of the Mediterranean spreading north into Europe and parts of Asia
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅弗 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "打開的"
挪亞的第三個兒子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅弗 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "打开的"
挪亚的第三个儿子
